effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
